text: Powerful units have stood firm. In unions where the central issues were confused, clear policy details- as on bases- were decisively carried. This, and the numbers of active workers who are beginning to understand how and why the trick was done, provides a strong, immediate basis for a campaign against weak and doubtful positions, and for a consistent peace policy.
handwritten_text: Powerful units have stood firm. In unions where the central issues were confused, clear policy details- as on bases- were decisively carried. This, and the numbers of active workers who are beginning to understand how and why the trick was done, provides a strong, immediate basis for a campaign against weak and doubtful positions, and for a consistent peace policy.
